note:
Constantly reawakening, momentarily illustrating, gardening, and stewarding in Portugal. Background as an environmental scientist.

I do simple illustrations inspired by nature. Hand-drawn and digital. Commissioned work, collaborations and freely given. I also offer environmental consulting. Check out my website for more.

Earth enters a new cycle, so are we. Let's dream and live the universal dream of peace, harmony and embodied love.

note:
Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
